body:
DECLARE
        @DocEntrySO INT				= $CURSOR$ 
      , @ItemCodeSO NVARCHAR(20)	= ''
      , @IMEI VARCHAR(32)			= '';

INSERT  INTO dbo.[@FPT_ImeiSO]
    (
         DocEntrySO
       , ItemCodeMap
       , LineNumMap
       , Imei
       , Type
       , CreateDate
       , Status
       , UpdateDate
       , UpdateBy
       , SoPhieu
       , U_PriceNew
       , U_PriceBHV
       , DocEntry_SOBHV
       , PushStatus
    )
SELECT
      R.DocEntry
	, R.ItemCode
	, R.LineNum
	, @IMEI
	, 2
	, GETDATE()
	, 1
	, GETDATE()
	, ''
	, 0
	, 0
	, 0
	, 0
	, 1
FROM
    dbo.RDR1 R (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.[@FPT_ItemConfig] F (NOLOCK)
			ON R.ItemCode = F.ItemCode
WHERE
    R.DocEntry = @DocEntrySO
    AND R.ItemCode = @ItemCodeSO
